item.title: Matthew add a quote by Mario Gonzalez
item.description: "Destiny is not a matter of fate, it is a matter of choice, and we have some choices to be made here." -- Mario Gonzalez

item.title: Matthew add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Matthew add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "I'm for truth, no matter who tells it. I'm for justice, no matter who it is for or against. I'm a human being, first and foremost, and as such I'm for whoever and whatever benefits humanity as a whole." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Matthew add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "Believe those who are seeking the truth. Doubt those who find it." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Matthew add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Matthew add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Matthew add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "Don't criticize what you can't understand." -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Matthew add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "All I can be is me- whoever that is. " -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Matthew add a quote by Kalu Ndukwe Kalu
item.description: "The things you do for yourself are gone when you are gone, but the things you do for others remain as your legacy." -- Kalu Ndukwe Kalu

item.title: Matthew add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss
